org.dockbox.selene.api.annotations.command

Annotation Type Command


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
public @interface Command
    The annotation used to mark a method or class as a command holder.
    See Also:
    Commands

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String[] aliases
      The aliases for the command.
      java.lang.String usage
      The usage context for the command.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean confirm
      Marks whether or not the command should require user confirmation before executing.
      long cooldownDuration
      The duration in the cooldown unit.
      java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit cooldownUnit
      The cooldown unit.
      boolean extend
      Marks whether the command is a standalone command, or adds child commands to a existing registration.
      boolean inherit
      Marks whether or not the command is a child command.
      java.lang.String permission
      The permissions for the command.

    • Element Detail

      • aliases

        public abstract java.lang.String[] aliases
        The aliases for the command.
        Returns:
        the aliases

      • usage

        public abstract java.lang.String usage
        The usage context for the command.
        Returns:
        the usage context for the command.
        See Also:
        Commands#defining-command-usage

      • permission

        public abstract java.lang.String permission
        The permissions for the command. Defaults to SeleneInformation.GLOBAL_BYPASS if not defined.
        Returns:
        the permission required for the command.
        Default:
        "selene.admin.bypass-all"

      • cooldownDuration

        public abstract long cooldownDuration
        The duration in the cooldown unit. Defaults to -1 if not defined, disabling the cooldown functionality for the command.
        Returns:
        the duration
        Default:
        -1L

      • cooldownUnit

        public abstract java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit cooldownUnit
        The cooldown unit. Defaults to ChronoUnit.SECONDS if not defined.
        Returns:
        the cooldown unit
        Default:
        java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit.SECONDS

      • inherit

        public abstract boolean inherit
        Marks whether or not the command is a child command. This typically only affects methods annoted with this annotation which are inside a class annoted with this annotation.
        Returns:
        true if the command is a child command
        Default:
        true

      • extend

        public abstract boolean extend
        Marks whether the command is a standalone command, or adds child commands to a existing registration. This typically only affects classes annoted with this annotation.
        Returns:
        true if this command adds child commands to a existing registration.
        Default:
        false

      • confirm

        public abstract boolean confirm
        Marks whether or not the command should require user confirmation before executing.
        Returns:
        true if confirmation is required.
        Default:
        false
